name: New Places, New Treasures
description:
Use the arrows to move and explore the different parts of the level!

You recently moved into a new area of a vast and woodsy village, hoping to see and explore new places. Luckily, your new place is right next to a mysterious dark cave that seems to be unexplored, and you take this chance to investigate. With a couple obstacles, puzzles and collectibles that you can stumble upon, will you be able to discover the cave’s most treasured secrets?

This was another project I did for a gaming design class I'm taking, and I'm very content with the end result. Hope you all enjoy this little game!
